import React, { Component } from 'react' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' import Navbar from '../Components/Navbar' import Title from '../Components/Title' import CardItems from '../Components/CardItems' import logo from './emenu.png'; // with import import './effects.css' /*This is the home page and makes use of the Navbar, homeNavConatiner, homeStatsContainer and TitleContainer components */ class Home extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { history: this.props.history } } render() { return (
subtitle="A contactless menu to keep you and your customers safe.">




) } } export default Home
